titles.title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to add to matters covered by counseling in the Transition Assistance Program.
To amend title 10, United States Code, to add to matters covered by counseling in the Transition Assistance Program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: This bill requires that pre-separation counseling under the Transition Assistance Program include information concerning health care, including mental health care, furnished by the Department of Veterans Affairs to veterans and members of the Armed Forces who have survived sexual assault, sexual or gender harassment, or intimate partner violence.
